info.title: Simple Transactions API
info.description: This API was developed based on REST technology, following the current technical standards. All of this to make the integration experience as easy as possible. All URLs are friendly and resource-oriented and use HTTP protocol standards for authentication and return codes. All responses are returned in JSON format.

example.message: You do not have enough balance to perform this action.

errors.value: The transaction value must be less than or equal to the balance amount.
